car.title: BMW X5 M50I
car.section1_desc: The BMW X5 comes with a choice of powerful engines, including a turbocharged inline-six and a V8 option, paired with an intelligent all-wheel-drive system. Its adaptive M suspension and available Dynamic Handling Package enhance agility and provide a sporty driving experience, whether on winding roads or rough terrain.
car.section2_desc: The 2023 X5 offers a sophisticated interior with high-quality materials, including Vernasca leather upholstery and fine-wood trim. It features a 12.3-inch iDrive 7.0 infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration, a digital instrument cluster, and an array of advanced safety features like active blind-spot detection and lane departure warning.
car.key_feature: Sleek and athletic BMW design.@Spacious and versatile interior with optional third-row seating.@Advanced driver-assistance systems@Customizable ambient lighting and high-end audio

car.title: Mercedes Benz G63
car.section1_desc: The 4.0L V8 engine delivers an impressive 577 horsepower, enabling the G 63 to go from 0 to 60 mph in just 4.5 seconds. It combines raw power with AMG's precision engineering for exceptional on-road and off-road performance.
car.section2_desc: Inside, the G 63 features a handcrafted cabin with Nappa leather upholstery, a dual 12.3-inch widescreen display, and the advanced MBUX infotainment system. It offers a blend of luxury, comfort, and cutting-edge technology to elevate every drive.
car.key_feature: All-Terrain Capability@Iconic Design

car.title: Range Rover Vogue (P530)
car.section1_desc: The Vogue offers an opulent interior with premium leather upholstery, heated and ventilated seats, and advanced air suspension, delivering a smooth and luxurious ride regardless of terrain.
car.section2_desc: Equipped with a Touch Pro Duo infotainment system featuring dual high-definition touchscreens, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and a Meridian™ sound system, the Vogue ensures a tech-savvy, connected, and immersive driving experience.
car.key_feature: Innovative Technology@Powerful Performance@Luxurious Interior@Advanced Off-Road Capability

car.title: Range Rover Defender
car.section1_desc: The Defender is engineered with Terrain Response 2 and All-Terrain Progress Control, allowing it to conquer challenging terrains effortlessly. Its high ground clearance, adaptive air suspension, and locking differentials make it an unmatched off-road vehicle.
car.section2_title: Durable, Modern Design with Practical Features
car.section2_desc: The Defender combines a rugged yet sophisticated design with practical features like a 3D surround camera, a robust exterior, and configurable storage options, ensuring durability and convenience for adventure enthusiasts
car.key_feature: Innovative Technology@Customizability@Off-Road Capability@Durable Design

car.title: Range Rover Sport (P400)
car.section1_desc: The Range Rover Sport offers a range of powerful engines, including a 5.0L supercharged V8, delivering up to 575 horsepower. Paired with Dynamic Response and adaptive air suspension, it provides a sporty and agile driving experience with superb handling on all terrains.
car.section2_desc: With its bold, aerodynamic styling and signature floating roof, the Range Rover Sport combines athletic aesthetics with luxury. The modern, tech-focused interior includes premium materials, a dual touchscreen infotainment system, and configurable ambient lighting.
car.key_feature: Pivi Pro Infotainment@Mild Hybrid Engine@Dynamic Air Suspension@Terrain Response

car.title: Mercedes Benz S580
car.section1_title: 4.0L V8 Biturbo Engine with EQ Boost
car.section1_desc: The S 580 features a powerful 4.0L V8 biturbo engine, enhanced by EQ Boost (mild hybrid system), delivering 496 horsepower and 516 lb-ft of torque. This combination provides exceptional performance with smooth, quick acceleration while maintaining efficiency.
car.section2_title: First-Class Cabin with Executive Rear Seating
car.section2_desc: The S 580 offers a luxurious, tech-filled interior, featuring high-end Nappa leather, customizable ambient lighting, and executive rear seating with massage functionality, reclining seats, and a dedicated infotainment system for unmatched passenger comfort.
car.key_feature: Performance@Safety@Luxury Interior@Advanced Technology

car.title: Nissan Patrol
car.section1_desc: The Patrol is equipped with a 5.6L V8 engine, delivering robust performance with around 400 horsepower and 560 Nm of torque. This engine provides impressive power for both on-road and off-road driving, ensuring strong acceleration and towing capability.
car.section2_desc: The Patrol features a range of off-road technologies, including the Hydraulic Body Motion Control system and an advanced 4WD system with multiple driving modes. These technologies enhance stability, control, and comfort on various terrains, making the Patrol highly capable for off-road adventures.
car.key_feature: Luxury Interior@Safety Technology@Premium interior with heated seats.@Advanced 4WD

car.title: Mercedes S500
car.section1_title: 3.0L Inline-6 Turbo Engine with EQ Boost
car.section1_desc: The S 500 is powered by a smooth and efficient 3.0L inline-6 turbo engine, enhanced with EQ Boost (mild hybrid technology), delivering 429 horsepower and seamless acceleration while optimizing fuel efficiency and reducing emissions.
car.section2_title: Advanced MBUX Hyperscreen and AI-Driven Infotainment
car.section2_desc: The S 500 boasts the cutting-edge MBUX Hyperscreen, a massive curved display that spans the dashboard, integrating AI-driven voice controls, navigation, and personalized driver assistance for a futuristic, user-friendly experience.
car.key_feature: 4.0L V8 Biturbo Engine@Luxury Interior

car.title: Chevy Tahoe
car.section1_desc: The Tahoe offers a range of engine choices, including a 5.3L V8 with 355 horsepower and an available 6.2L V8 with 420 horsepower. These engines provide robust performance and towing capability, making the Tahoe well-suited for both daily driving and heavy-duty tasks.
car.section2_desc: The Tahoe features a large 10.2-inch Chevrolet Infotainment 3 Plus system with a high-resolution touchscreen, Apple CarPlay, and Android Auto integration. This system offers a user-friendly interface with navigation, voice recognition, and connectivity features, enhancing the overall driving experience.
car.key_feature: Spacious Interior@Advanced Technology@Powerful Performance@Safety Features

car.title: Jeep Wrangler (Sahara)
car.section1_desc: The Sahara comes equipped with Jeep's Command-Trac® 4x4 system, featuring a two-speed transfer case and a 4:1 low-range gear ratio for exceptional off-road capability. This system ensures superior traction and control on rugged terrain, making it ideal for off-road adventures.
car.section2_desc: The 2023 Sahara features a refined interior with premium cloth or leather-trimmed seats, an 8.4-inch Uconnect® touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration, and available advanced safety features such as blind-spot monitoring and rear cross-path detection.
car.key_feature: Iconic Jeep Wrangler design@Removable doors, roof, and fold-down windshield.@Advanced safety features@Premium leather-trimmed seats, customisable interior.

car.title: Ford Bronco
car.section1_desc: The Bronco Sport is equipped with G.O.A.T. Modes™, which include multiple drive modes such as Sand, Mud/Ruts, and Grass/Gravel/Snow. This feature allows the vehicle to adapt to various off-road conditions, enhancing its capability across different terrains.
car.section2_desc: The 2023 Bronco Sport comes with standard all-wheel drive (AWD) and an advanced Terrain Management System. This system includes an electronically controlled 4WD and multiple terrain settings to optimize performance and traction, making it well-suited for both rugged trails and everyday driving
car.key_feature: Rugged, adventure-ready design.@Terrain Management System@Advanced 4x4 capability for all terrains@Spacious interior with flexible cargo space.

car.title: Mazda CX 30
car.section1_desc: The CX-30 offers Mazda’s i-Activ All-Wheel Drive® system, which continuously monitors driving conditions and adjusts power distribution to optimize traction and stability. This feature enhances performance and safety across various road conditions.
car.section2_desc: The 2023 Bronco Sport comes with standard all-wheel drive (AWD) and an advanced Terrain Management System. This system includes an electronically controlled 4WD and multiple terrain settings to optimize performance and traction, making it well-suited for both rugged trails and everyday driving
car.key_feature: Sleek, premium design.@Advanced safety with i-Activsense® technology.@Luxurious interior with high-quality materials.@Excellent fuel efficiency for its class.

car.title: Mazda CX5
car.section1_desc: The CX-5 offers an available 2.5L turbocharged engine, delivering up to 250 horsepower and 320 lb-ft of torque. This engine provides robust performance and smooth acceleration, enhancing the driving experience.
car.section2_desc: The 2023 CX-5 includes Mazda's i-Activsense® suite of advanced safety technologies, such as Adaptive Cruise Control, Blind Spot Monitoring, and Rear Cross Traffic Alert. These features work together to provide enhanced safety and driver confidence on the road.
car.key_feature: Refined, stylish exterior@Advanced safety features, including Smart City Brake Support.@Premium interior with heated seats.@Superior handling and driving dynamics.

car.title: Cadillac CT5 (2024)
car.section1_desc: The 2024 Cadillac CTS offers a range of engine choices, including a 3.6L V6 engine producing up to 335 horsepower and an available 6.2L V8 engine in the higher trims. These engines deliver strong performance and acceleration, providing a dynamic driving experience.
car.section2_desc: The CTS features Cadillac’s latest technology, including a 10-inch touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, a customizable digital driver display, and advanced driver assistance features like adaptive cruise control and lane-keeping assist. This tech suite ensures connectivity, convenience, and safety on the road.
car.key_feature: 2.0L Turbocharged engine, 237 horsepower.@10-speed automatic transmission@10-inch HD touchscreen with CUE® system.@Magnetic Ride Control for Smooth Driving.

car.title: Chevrolet Trailblazer
car.section1_desc: The Trailblazer offers a choice between a 1.2L turbocharged engine with 137 horsepower and a more powerful 1.3L turbocharged engine producing 155 horsepower. These engines provide a balance of performance and fuel efficiency, making the Trailblazer a versatile option for various driving needs.
car.section2_desc: The 2023 Trailblazer includes standard safety features such as Forward Collision Alert, Automatic Emergency Braking, and Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning. These technologies enhance driver confidence and help prevent accidents by providing alerts and assisting with collision avoidance.
car.key_feature: Compact SUV with sporty design.@Excellent fuel efficiency.@Flexible seating and cargo space.@Standard safety features, including forward collision alert.

car.title: Infinity QX 50
car.section1_desc: The QX50 is powered by a 2.0L VC-Turbo engine, which uses variable compression technology to adjust the engine's compression ratio on-the-fly. This innovation allows the QX50 to deliver up to 268 horsepower and 280 lb-ft of torque, optimizing performance and fuel efficiency based on driving conditions.
car.section2_desc: The 2023 QX50 features Infiniti's ProPILOT Assist system, which includes adaptive cruise control, lane centering assist, and traffic sign recognition. This suite of advanced driver assistance technologies enhances convenience and safety by helping the driver maintain proper lane positioning and manage vehicle speed.
car.key_feature: Luxurious, spacious interior.@Advanced driver-assistance features.@Unique variable-compression engine technology.@Sleek, aerodynamic design.

car.title: Nissan Pathfinder
car.section1_desc: The 2023 Pathfinder is powered by a 3.5-liter V6 engine that delivers 284 horsepower, providing strong performance and smooth acceleration, ideal for both city driving and off-road adventures.
car.section2_desc: This advanced driver assistance system helps with highway driving by combining adaptive cruise control and lane-centering technology. It can assist with steering, braking, and acceleration in certain conditions, offering a more relaxed and controlled driving experience.
car.key_feature: 3.5L V6 engine, 284 horsepower.@9-speed automatic transmission.@8-inch touchscreen with NissanConnect®.@Intelligent 4x4 with multiple drive modes.

car.title: GMC Yukon Denali
car.section1_desc: The 6.2L V8 engine in the Yukon Denali is part of GMC's premium lineup, offering robust towing capacity and a smooth, powerful driving experience.
car.section2_title: Magnetic Ride Control with Adaptive Suspension.
car.section2_desc: The GMC Yukon Denali with Magnetic Ride Control and Adaptive Suspension offers advanced technology designed to enhance ride comfort and handling.This feature dynamically adjusts the suspension settings based on driving conditions and style. It helps to improve ride quality and handling by adapting to factors like road surface, speed, and cornering forces. The goal is to provide a balance between comfort and performance, enhancing both driving dynamics and passenger comfort.
car.key_feature: Luxurious, spacious full-size SUV.@Powerful V8 engine for impressive performance.@Advanced tech features, including a rear camera mirror.@Premium interior with heated and ventilated seats.

car.title: Honda ZR-V
car.section1_desc: The ZR-V comes equipped with Honda Sensing®, a comprehensive suite of safety and driver-assistive technologies. This includes features such as collision mitigation braking, lane-keeping assist, adaptive cruise control, and road departure mitigation, all designed to enhance safety and driving confidence.
car.section2_desc: The ZR-V features a sleek, sporty exterior design with a dynamic front grille and LED headlights. Inside, it offers a modern infotainment system with a 9-inch touchscreen display, Apple CarPlay, and Android Auto integration, ensuring seamless connectivity and an engaging driving experience.
car.key_feature: Advanced Safety Features@Honda Sensing Safety Suite@Modern Infotainment System@Affordable Maintenance

car.title: Nissan X Trail
car.section1_desc: The X-Trail offers an intelligent all-wheel-drive system that automatically adjusts power distribution to the wheels that need it most, enhancing traction and stability on various road conditions.
car.section2_desc: This advanced driver assistance system includes adaptive cruise control and lane-keeping assist, providing a more convenient and controlled driving experience by helping with steering, acceleration, and braking on highways.
car.key_feature: Intelligent 4x4@Advanced Safety Features@Modern Infotainment System@Strong Performance

car.title: MG HS Trophy
car.section1_desc: The HS Trophy is equipped with a 2.0-liter turbocharged engine that delivers strong performance and acceleration, providing a sporty driving experience.
car.section2_desc: The interior features high-quality materials and a range of advanced technologies, including a 10.1-inch touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, a digital driver display, and a panoramic sunroof for a more luxurious and connected driving experience.
car.key_feature: Turbocharged Engine@Panoramic Sunroof@Advanced Safety Features@Luxurious Interior

car.title: Jeep Gladiator Sport 2023 (Silver)
car.section1_desc: The Gladiator Sport comes with Jeep’s Trail Rated® 4x4 system, which includes features like the Command-Trac® 4WD system with a 2.72:1 low-range gear ratio. This system enhances the Gladiator's off-road performance, providing excellent traction and control in challenging conditions.
car.section2_desc: The Gladiator Sport features a 5-foot truck bed with a high-strength steel construction and a variety of practical storage solutions, including a bed-mounted trail rail system. This versatility makes it ideal for carrying gear and equipment for both work and adventure.
car.key_feature: Rugged, off-road capable pickup@Removable doors and roof for an open-air experience.@7-inch Uconnect® touchscreen.@Best-in-class towing capacity.@Durable steel bed with integrated tie-downs

faq.qua: What documents do I need to rent a car
faq.ans: You will need a valid driver's license, a credit card in the renter's name, and proof of identification (such as a passport or national ID). International renters may require additional documentation, like an International driving LICENSE.

faq.qua: Are there any mileage restrictions on the rental vehicles
faq.ans: Our rentals come with unlimited mileage unless otherwise specified. Certain vehicles or special deals may have mileage caps, which will be clearly outlined in your rental agreement.

faq.qua: What happens if I return the car late?
faq.ans: If you return the vehicle after the agreed-upon time, you may be charged a late fee. Our late fee is calculated on an hourly or daily rate, depending on how much the return time exceeds the original agreement.

faq.qua: What should I do if the car breaks down or if I’m involved in an accident?
faq.ans: In case of a breakdown, please contact our 24/7 roadside assistance number provided with your rental agreement. For accidents, call local emergency services first, then notify us immediately to guide you through the insurance and reporting process.

faq.qua: Can I cancel or modify my reservation?
faq.ans: Yes, you can cancel or modify your reservation up to 24 hours before the pick-up time without a fee. Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a fee, depending on the type of reservation and our policy at the time.

faq.qua: Can i smoke in the rental car?
faq.ans: The AutoBreeze fleet is strictly non-smoking. Renters and their passengers are not permitted to smoke in any AutoBreeze rental cars. AutoBreeze takes reports of smoking very seriously. If smoke is detected in a returned vehicle, the renter is subject to a fine of up to AED 500.

faq.qua: Is there an age requirement to rent a car from AUTOBREEZE CAR RENTAL?
faq.ans: You must be 21+ to rent a car in the UAE and a valid credit card.
